name: Shesha Naga
shortLoreBlurb: Shesha Naga is a deity/spirit from India (Hindu) associated with serpent, cosmos. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places.
description: Shesha Naga is a deity/spirit from India (Hindu) associated with serpent, cosmos. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places.
